Row.Text: Yari Drill Yard
The Yari Drill Yard allows recruitment of Yari Samurai, a more powerful anti-Mounted melee Unit.
The Yari Drill Yard allows recruitment of Yari Samurai, a more powerful anti-Mounted melee Unit.
Archery Dojo
The Archery Dojo allows recruitment of Bow Samurai, a more powerful ranged Unit.
The Archery Dojo allows recruitment of Bow Samurai, a more powerful ranged Unit.
The Stable allows recruitment of Light Cavalry, a powerful and fast Mounted Unit.
The Stable allows recruitment of Light Cavalry, a powerful and fast Mounted Unit.
Warhorse Stable
The Warhorse Stable allows recruitment of more advanced cavalry units such as Yari Cavalry and Bow Cavalry.
The Warhorse Stable allows recruitment of more advanced cavalry units such as Yari Cavalry and Bow Cavalry.
Sword School
The Sword School allows recruitment of sword-wielding melee Units such as the Katana Samurai and No Dachi Samurai.
The Sword School allows recruitment of sword-wielding melee Units such as the Katana Samurai and No Dachi Samurai.
No-Dachi Dojo
The No-Dachi Dojo allows recruitment of No-Dachi Samurai, a powerful aggressive melee Unit.
The No-Dachi Dojo allows recruitment of No-Dachi Samurai, a powerful aggressive melee Unit.
Rice Exchange
The Rice Exchange increases the amount of [ICON_GOLD] a province generates.
Stronghold
The Stronghold increases the city's Defensive Strength and Hit Points. The city must possess Walls before a Stronghold can be constructed.
City must have Walls.
The Castle increases the city's Defensive Strength and Hit Points. The city must possess a Stronghold before a Castle can be constructed.
City must have a Stronghold.
Citadel

The Citadel is the strongest defensive building in the game. It makes your city almost impossible to siege, and is a mark of your clan's might! The city must possess a Castle before the Citadel can be constructed.
City must have a Castle.
Sake Den

The Sake Den allows you to build Ninja, powerful recon and assassin units. The Sake Den increases a clan's [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness. It cannot provide more Happiness than there are [ICON_CITIZEN] Citizens in a city.
Allows you to build [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Ninja[ENDCOLOR], a powerful assassin and recon unit.
Criminal Syndicate

The Criminal Syndicate increases the [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness of your empire, but it cannot provide more happiness than there are citizens in the city. The city must possess a Sake Den before the Criminal Syndicate can be constructed.
Buddhist Temple
Can only be built in cities following [ICON_RELIGION_SHINTO] Shinto Buddhism. The Buddhist Temple provides [ICON_PEACE] Faith per turn and enables creation of fearsome Warrior Monks.
Chapel
Can only be built in cities following [ICON_RELIGION_CHRISTIANITY] Christianity. The Chapel provides [ICON_PEACE] Faith per turn and enables creation of Imported Matchlock Ashigaru.
Barren Soil

In Shogun: Sword of the Samurai scenario, provinces start with a pre-assigned soil fertility. Soil fertility cannot be modified in any way and will affect the amount of military units your clan is able to support.
Meagre Soil

In Shogun: Sword of the Samurai scenario, provinces start with a pre-assigned soil fertility. Soil fertility cannot be modified in any way and will affect the amount of military units your clan is able to support.
Average Soil

In Shogun: Sword of the Samurai scenario, provinces start with a pre-assigned soil fertility. Soil fertility cannot be modified in any way and will affect the amount of military units your clan is able to support.
Fertile Soil

In Shogun: Sword of the Samurai scenario, provinces start with a pre-assigned soil fertility. Soil fertility cannot be modified in any way and will affect the amount of military units your clan is able to support.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Fertile and Very Fertile provinces will allow you field many more powerful military units, and should be defended from invaders at all costs! If the province is captured, the capturing civilization will gain 50% more gold than normal.
Very Fertile Soil

In Shogun: Sword of the Samurai scenario, provinces start with a pre-assigned soil fertility. Soil fertility cannot be modified in any way and will affect the amount of military units your clan is able to support.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Fertile and Very Fertile provinces will allow you field many more powerful military units, and should be defended from invaders at all costs! If the province is captured, the capturing civilization will gain twice as much gold than normal.
Surface Gold Mine
A province with a Surface Gold Mine is rich and provides a lot of income per turn. Upgrade the Gold Mine even further to improve your income gains!
Blacksmith

A province with a Blacksmith can produce units with higher quality armor and weapons than other provinces, increasing their combat prowess. Turn these provinces into military production factories and crush your foes with higher quality weapons and armor!
All land units trained in this city start with the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Improved Armor and Weapons[ENDCOLOR] promotion, increasing their [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength.
